_sText: nyro's SDK Steam Group MG\_LT\_GALAXY\_V5 - 01-09-12 ======================= - Map by: nyro - - Feedback & Testing: The Lt. Team A space themed map consisting of 12 different games, enjoy! **01-09-12** _v5 ------------------ - _v5 release - [BLACKHOLE] Fixed issue where physics objects didn't have 0 gravity. - [BLACKHOLE] Asteroid spawn rate now increases sooner, and platforms get sucked in no matter what over time. - [BLACKHOLE] Knives are no longer present at the start, instead they are given near the end. - [ICESKATE] Fixed issue where the player would fall to the ground while skating. - [ICESKATE] Reduced the amount of extra ammo in the shotguns to 8. - [ICESKATE] Increased the speed of the boosters at the bottom middle. - [ICESKATE] Lowered the roof heights by 64 units. - [NADE] Reduced gravity from 300 to 175. - [SCOUT] Removed Glocks. - [SLIDE] Removed a set of poles after the first ramp. - [SPHERE] Attempted to fix monitor lag/freezes again. - Unused map entities are now removed once a game is chosen in order to free up resources. - Reduced the push height of the end platforms to prevent players who finish 2nd or lower from flying out of it. **09-14-11** _v4 ------------------ - _v4 release - [AWP] Optimized for better FPS - [BUY] Added last player location announcement, enabled after 15 seconds - [BLACKHOLE] Reduced chance this will get picked on random from 20% to 15%(roughly) - [BLACKHOLE] Reduced the total amount of platforms - [BLACKHOLE] Fixed objects falling to bottom(Related to above change) - [BLACKHOLE] Platforms no longer get automatically sucked in after a certain time - [BLACKHOLE] Asteroids will spawn at a faster rate as time passes - [NADE] Removed middle ramp - [SCOUT] Optimized for better FPS - [SURF] Added a 2nd yellow surf and changed the red section slightly - [SURF] Fixed an imbalance between the 2 paths - Reduced autoslay timer from 5m to 3m30s(As a result, .mp3 file size is smaller too) - Reduced time knives are given from 15s to 10s - Fixed a Linux server crash related to point_template's(If your server crashed before v3 I don't know the cause, sorry!) **08-28-11** _v3 ------------------ - _v3 release - [BLACKHOLE] New game in random - [BHOP] Optimized for better FPS - [CLIMB] Optimized for better FPS - [CLIMB] Revised Yellow & Red sections - [AWP] Revised - [AWP] Added Deagles - [NADE] Revised - [ICESKATE] Lowered push from 64 to 48 units - [ICESKATE] Lowered height needed to reach the rooftops - [ICESKATE] Added bottom middle non-skating section - [OBSTACLE] Made the spinner platforms wider - [OBSTACLE] The start of the air strafe has been made easier - [SCOUT] Added booster ramps - [SCOUT] Added Glocks - [SLIDE] Extended end of the final jump - [SPHERE] Rings are now syncronized with the music's beat - [SPHERE] Changed loser room, sorry for the nausea! - [SPHERE] Disabled 3d Skybox in an attempt to eliminate lag issues - [SPHERE] The 1st level no longer has a red ring, and the 3rd/4th levels don't last as long - [SURF] Made green section on Surf slightly easier - The skybox will sometimes revert back to the old v1 style - sv_gravity will reset at the end of each round(no more lowgrav physics on following map) - Added 15 second wait time on race based courses once a player wins(except for Climb) - Fixed ugly stretched texture on background stars **05-16-11** _v2 ------------------ - _v2 release - Optimized the 3d Skybox - Optimized Sphere - Optimized Buy - Added various details - The 3d skybox has been revised to look more realistic - Reduced the poly count of the asteroids by roughly 33% **05-08-11** _v1 ------------------ - _v1 release **Special Thanks** ------------------ - cfoust - Author of Propper - qr - Helping pick out the majority of the soundtrack. - CHECK EM - Vote system idea for choosing what you want to play. - Chris528 - Author of the dev texture pack. **Soundtrack** ------------------ - Surf // Air - Empty House - Sphere // Guitar - Red and White - Climb // Bathysphere - Augusta - Bhop // Jon Hopkins - Wire - Scout // Loscil - Brittle - Iceskate // Fennesz & Sakamoto - Glow - Nade // Flica - Late - Race // Sonic Mayhem - Disclosure - Startroom // Immediate Music - The Hidden - Awp // Spacecraft - Earthtime Tapestry - Buy // Solar Fields - Electric Fluids (Early Mix) - Slide // Ulrich Schnauss - Monday-Paracetamol Please rate and/or leave a comment! Thanks! -
